code_value: Questions 1~2 You’ve got lost on the way to the Grand Theatre. Ask a passerby two questions for help.</br>Questions 3~4 Your friend, Tom, has won the first prize in the English speech contest. Ask him two questions about it.
Questions 1~2 You’ve got lost on the way to the Grand Theatre. Ask a passerby two questions for help.
Questions 3~4 Your friend, Tom, has won the first prize in the English speech contest. Ask him two questions about it.
